meanings.definition: The action of saturating something to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The oversaturation of colors in the painting made it look chaotic.
meanings.sent2: The oversaturation of water in the sponge caused it to drip.
meanings.sent3: The oversaturation of toppings on the pizza made it impossible to pick up.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the oversaturation of joy in a room full of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The oversaturation of perfume in the air made it hard to breathe.
